title: My screen for league is so small?
body:
Hello, after this patch everything was fine, but now when i run it, it's small? I reset all video settings to default! this is how it looks from my perspective. https://gyazo.com/4e71bf31fa2961c2560eb98fba9b7426
https://gyazo.com/7307933b01ad9c433dfeafe1b3aee33c

replies.body:
That's really weird, I haven't seen a resolution so small.  Do you know what resolution you have the game set to?  Are you on a 4K?  Try resetting your Config folder to default, which should return your resolution to normal settings:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

I hope that helps!
same thing happened to me and when i saw ur post and replies i fixed it,thank you a lot,its happening from 3-4 weeks. :)
UPDATE: THIS HAPPENS ON DIFFERENT ACCOUNTS TOO!
